name: MY LIFE (kippiegames)
description:
We spent several weeks getting to know some young adults who were either homeless or at risk of homelessness. Through conversations with them we designed, developed and created ‘My Life’. 

Sometimes it's hard just to get up in the morning.  Can you balance your your money, your stress levels, your health and your relationships and find a way to make it through?  Each level presents a different challenge - make friends, avoid trouble, keep away from temptation, keep a roof over your head, hold down a job.  How will you do when the odds are stacked against you?
